events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to request a refund because the item doesn't fit at all.
The reported problem fits the criteria for a refund due to incorrect item delivery and sizing.
Assigning the refund case to agent Jane Smith for detailed handling and follow-up.
Hello! This is Jane from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect order.
Could you please provide a picture of the item you received along with the order number to verify the issue?
I have attached photos of the item and the packing slip. The order number is 123456789. Please process my refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate the efficient handling of my case.
The refund case has been successfully closed and the payment returned. Please let us know if you need anything else.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting us.
